tender.title: The Exclusive Licencing Agreement for the temporal broadcast of the audiovisual
tender.description:
The Exclusive Licencing Agreement for the temporal broadcast of the audiovisual work: “ELSTREE 1976 (1x97´)”, Through the Free TV signal of Estación de Televisión XEIPN decanal Once del Distrito Federal and their retransmission stations.
Exclusive Licensing Agreement for the broadcast of the works: “CHAMPS (1x90´)”, THE REXETTE DIARIES (1x90´)”, through the Free TV signal of Estación de Televisión XEIPN de Canal Once del Distrito Federal and their retransmission stations, as well as the non-exclusive license for temporary broadcast on the XEIPN Canal Oncel del Distrito Federal website, for a period from December 31th, 2017 to December 30th, 2019
